# app-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description               | Type                                                           | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Button is disabled        | `boolean`                                                      | `false`     |
| `text`     | `text`     | The text of the button    | `string`                                                       | `''`        |
| `type`     | `type`     | The type of the button    | `string`                                                       | `'button'`  |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | The variant of the button | `"destructive" \| "primary-lg" \| "primary-sm" \| "secondary"` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event      | Description                  | Type                |
| ---------- | ---------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `btnClick` | Emits when button is clicked | `CustomEvent<void>` |
